languages.text: "Вспомни мир Лилэтан, на котором сошлись наши пути. Каков он? В чем его суть? Величие Лилэтан — не в зелени необъятных лесов, не в глубине его вод. Лилэтан красив словом. Тем, как оно танцует на языке. И даже ты, элантах, можешь это прочувствовать. Попробуй произнести его — медленно, бережно, отбрось пустые мысли. Чувствуй. Возможно, тогда ты поймешь".

"Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."
languages.original_text: "Вспомни мир Лилэтан, на котором сошлись наши пути. Каков он? В чем его суть? Величие Лилэтан — не в зелени необъятных лесов, не в глубине его вод. Лилэтан красив словом. Тем, как оно танцует на языке. И даже ты, элантах, можешь это прочувствовать. Попробуй произнести его — медленно, бережно, отбрось пустые мысли. Чувствуй. Возможно, тогда ты поймешь".

languages.text: «Piensa en el Lilaethan, el mundo en el que nuestros caminos se cruzaron. ¿Qué es en realidad? ¿Cuál es su esencia? El esplendor del Lilaethan no procede del verdor de sus extensos bosques ni de la profundidad de sus aguas. Su belleza radica en la palabra. El modo en que danza en la lengua. Incluso tú, elantach, puedes experimentarlo. Inténtalo: pronuncia la palabra. Despacio, con delicadeza, apartando todo pensamiento inconexo de tu mente. Siéntela. Quizá entonces lo veas».
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

traits.locale_text: «Piensa en el Lilaethan, el mundo en el que nuestros caminos se cruzaron. ¿Qué es en realidad? ¿Cuál es su esencia? El esplendor del Lilaethan no procede del verdor de sus extensos bosques ni de la profundidad de sus aguas. Su belleza radica en la palabra. El modo en que danza en la lengua. Incluso tú, elantach, puedes experimentarlo. Inténtalo: pronuncia la palabra. Despacio, con delicadeza, apartando todo pensamiento inconexo de tu mente. Siéntela. Quizá entonces lo veas».

languages.text: 「我らの道が交差した惑星、リラエタンを思い浮かべてほしい。あれは一体なんだった？本質はなんなのだろう？リラエタンの素晴らしさは、緑豊かな広大な森や海の深さから来ているのではない。あの惑星の美しさは、その言葉にある。舌の上で踊るように発せられる。エランタ、お前でさえをそれを感じられるだろう。やってみろ…あらゆる雑念を取り払い、言葉をゆっくりと、繊細に発してみるんだ。感じろ。そうすれば理解できるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの道が交差した惑星、リラエタンを思い浮かべてほしい。あれは一体なんだった？本質はなんなのだろう？リラエタンの素晴らしさは、緑豊かな広大な森や海の深さから来ているのではない。あの惑星の美しさは、その言葉にある。舌の上で踊るように発せられる。エランタ、お前でさえをそれを感じられるだろう。やってみろ…あらゆる雑念を取り払い、言葉をゆっくりと、繊細に発してみるんだ。感じろ。そうすれば理解できるかもしれない」

languages.text: “想一想我们的道路初次交汇之地，莉莱赞。它究竟是什么？它的本质是什么？莉莱赞的壮丽，并不在于它广袤的苍翠森林，或澄澈的幽深水域。它的美，蕴含于那个词语本身，蕴含于它在舌尖上跳跃的旋律。外界人，即使是你，也可以尝试感受它的美。试着抛开所有杂念，缓慢地、专注地说出那个单词。用心感受，或许就能看到。”
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

traits.locale_text: “想一想我们的道路初次交汇之地，莉莱赞。它究竟是什么？它的本质是什么？莉莱赞的壮丽，并不在于它广袤的苍翠森林，或澄澈的幽深水域。它的美，蕴含于那个词语本身，蕴含于它在舌尖上跳跃的旋律。外界人，即使是你，也可以尝试感受它的美。试着抛开所有杂念，缓慢地、专注地说出那个单词。用心感受，或许就能看到。”

languages.text: « Pensez à la lilaethan, le monde sur lequel nos chemins se sont croisés. Qu'est-elle réellement ? Quelle est son essence ? Elle ne tire pas sa magnificence du vert de ses vastes forêts ou de la profondeur de ses eaux. Sa beauté réside dans son nom, dans la façon dont il danse sur la langue. Même vous, elantach, pouvez le deviner. Essayez donc... Prononcez ce mot lentement, délicatement, en écartant toutes les pensées importunes. Sentez-le. Peut-être qu'alors vos yeux s'ouvriront. »
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

Elle ne tire pas sa magnificence du vert de ses vastes forêts ou de la profondeur de ses eaux. Sa beauté réside dans son nom, dans la façon dont il danse sur la langue. Même vous, elantach, pouvez le deviner. Essayez donc... Prononcez ce mot lentement, délicatement, en écartant toutes les pensées importunes. Sentez-le. Peut-être qu'alors vos yeux s'ouvriront. »

languages.text: "Denkt an die Lileath, die Welt, auf der sich unsere Wege gekreuzt haben. Was ist sie wirklich? Was ist ihre Essenz? Die Erhabenheit der Lileath kommt nicht aus dem Grün ihrer riesigen Wälder oder aus den Tiefen ihrer Gewässer. Ihre Schönheit liegt in dem Wort. Darin, wie es auf der Zunge tanzt. Und selbst Ihr, Elantach, könnt es spüren. Versucht es. Sagt das Wort langsam, zart, vergesst alle anderen Gedanken. Spürt es. Vielleicht begreift Ihr es dann."
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

Und selbst Ihr, Elantach, könnt es spüren. Versucht es. Sagt das Wort langsam, zart, vergesst alle anderen Gedanken. Spürt es. Vielleicht begreift Ihr es dann."

languages.text: "Yollarımızın kesiştiği Lilaethan'ı düşün. Lilaethan aslen ne ki? Özünde ne var? Lilaethan'ın ihtişamı, engin ormanlarının yeşilliğinden veya sularının derinliğinden gelmiyor. Güzelliği kelimede, söylerken dilinde sergilediği dansta saklı. Bunu sen bile hissedebilirsin elantach. Denesene. Kelimeyi yavaşça, narince, tüm dağınık düşüncelerini bir kenara koyarak söyle. Hisset. Belki o zaman anlarsın."
languages.original_text: "Think of the Lilaethan, the world on which our paths crossed. What is it truly? What is its essence? The Lilaethan's magnificence comes not from the green of its vast forests, or from the depths of its waters. Its beauty is in the word. In the way it dances on the tongue. And even you, elantach, can sense it. Try — say the word, slowly, delicately, casting aside all stray thoughts. Feel. Perhaps then you will see."

Güzelliği kelimede, söylerken dilinde sergilediği dansta saklı. Bunu sen bile hissedebilirsin elantach. Denesene. Kelimeyi yavaşça, narince, tüm dağınık düşüncelerini bir kenara koyarak söyle.
